entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
